author: Gul T
title: A wonderful experience!
text:
I stayed at the Marmara Manhattan recently for 4 nights after receiving a recommendation from a friend. It turned out to be so much better than anything I expected!
The rooms were beautiful and spacious. Unbelievable space for a hotel in Manhattan. The kitchen is fully functional with a stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher, and also stocked with crockery and cutlery. Flat screen televisions in both rooms and housekeeping every day. The bathrooms were lovely and impeccably clean, with a bath and shower, and stocked with toiletries. I was on the 15th floor and got a decent internet speed too.
There is a Q line subway station just a few steps away along with a grocery store and a 24 hour pharmacy amongst other things.
The best part about the hotel though is the staff. Every single staff member I interacted with - reception staff, housekeeping and the doorman were lovely, warm and extremely helpful. Every time I needed help or had a query, assistance was provided within seconds.
Fantastic job guys!
